textes.t: You must lose fifty percent of your life to use this jutsu !
You must be on the ground to use it
No target available to launch Shadow Shuriken!
You haven't enough Chakra to use this jutsu!
You must lose more life to use this jutsu!
You have not chosen yet which element your ninja will master. Each has his opposite, and afterward you cannot return on this choice.
Saving on the server is not available for the moment.
The server doesn't recognise you, please enter your login and password.
* What you've done will not be saved!
These data are informative and not editable.
Throwing weapon that explode with contact.
Quick ranged weapon,but fewer damages and range than the kunaï.
Big ranged weapon, following the locked on target.
Execute an elemental attack according to your element.
Allow you to activate/desactivate the walking on walls.
Create a devastating attack in a large range.
Shape shifting is a Doton specific jutsu.
Walking on water is a Suiton specific jutsu.
Thorns is a Doton specific jutsu.
Phoenix is a Katon specific jutsu.
Tsunami is a Suiton specific jutsu.
Teleportation is a Raiton specific jutsu.
Tornado is a Futon specific jutsu.
Send message (Press once to enter a message, press again to send).
Older Messages (Press once to see it, press again to hide it).
Show Game Menu (Pause is only available in solo).
Show scoreboard (Keep pressing, then unleash to hide it).
Big thanks to the players for their encouragment and their excellent ideas!
Impossible to save : visitor or server off ?!
Not enough assassinations to be rewarded.
Not enough races done to be rewarded.
Increasing attack damages (not including Jutsus and explosive Kunai) and range.
You've gained 5 strenght points thanks to Cloak!
You've gained 5 speed points thanks to Shoes!
##TOUCHE## : Launch an elemental attack according to your class.(lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : You can now double jump! (lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Create a shield to protect yourself from attacks.(lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : You can now walk on walls for a moment.(lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
You've gained 5 points thanks to Shoes!
##TOUCHE## : Create a devastating attack when you are on the ground in a close range. (lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Increase the throwing speed during a limited time. (Raiton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : You can now be sneaky with this partial invisibility during a limited time. (Futon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Decrease jutsus or explosive Kunai damages during a limited time.(Katon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : You can now walk on water during a limited time. (Suiton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : You can change your shape during a limited time, and turn into a rock to be sneaky. (Doton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Create a terrifying attack on a target. (Katon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Create a fearsome devastating wave! (Suiton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Impale your ennemy with sharp thorns coming from the ground.(Doton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Create a lightning dash in the direction you want. (Raiton , lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Create an unpredictable storm on a target. (Futon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
The RSA public key doesn't correspond to the one used by the system.
The server is using a password, and the password you entered is incorrect.
Connection failed. If you want more informations, please check the FAQ!
The server cannot accept more player, the game is full.
You have been banned from the server you try to connect to.
Impossible to enter two servers at once!
Internal error during the network interface initialisation. The connexion corridor is probably already used. For further informations, please check the FAQ!
Wrong connection parameters. For further informations, please check the FAQ!
The server doesn't exist anymore, connexion aborted.
The player cannot connect himself to his own server
The 'NAT target' isn't connected to the facilitator. For further informations, please check the FAQ!
Connection lost during connection attempt to the NAT target. For further informations, please check the FAQ!
Problem finding the Network Address Translation (NAT).
Public IP adress cannot be connected. (port ##PORT## blocked), impossible to create a server.
Public IP adress but the server is not initialized, it has to be launch to check the accessibility. Please do the test again when you're ready.
The NAT has a restricting port type, it's impossible to do a punchthrough NAT for everyone if it's not symetrical : Some connections can fail.
The NAT is a Symetrical type, impossible to do a punchthrough NAT to another symetrical systems, nor to the restricted port : Some connections can fail.
The NAT punchthrough is completely managed. You can connect to all the server.
A castle in border of a waterfall
The only rule is to kill everything you are encountering!
Team mode, every new connected is going to the least numerous team.
Scroll mode : Get the sacred scroll and stay in a zone to win!
When it's desactivated, you cannot see the name of the ninja you're aiming.
Let 'Password' empty if you don't want to have a private game!
This server requires a password. If you don't have it, choose another server!
This game is protected with a password!
Impossible to connect to this game: you haven't entered the password!
This game has been created with the version ##VERSION1##, and you have the version ##VERSION0## : Impossible to connect!
Impossible to connect : Versions are not the same !
This game has been created with a previous version, and not with the new one : Impossible to connect !
Imoossible to connect: the players' versions are not he same !
No game found! Refreshing in ##SECONDE## sec.
Connection problems have been detected : ##MESSAGE## For further informations, please check the FAQ!
One point in the capacity 'Speed' and two points in 'Strength'.
Put at least ##MESSAGE## from "My Ninja" options to start playing!
Loading in progress...Just a few seconds before the quest of your Nindo!
Find the parchment before another ninja do it !
A ninja found scroll. Try to kill him before he accumulates enough energy to become the Ninja Tooken !
You found the scroll. Stay in the indicated zone to become the Ninja Tooken!
The interface is hidden. Press again "##TOUCHE##" to see the interface.

Every fifty years since thousand years, The lone Yagishiri island is the place where the Earth biggest tournament takes place. The world most skilled shinobis are facing in merciless and bloody fights.
The most powerful will become a ninja master : The Ninja Tooken.
To become the new Ninja Tooken, you have to gain a perfect mastery of your mental and physical abilities.
But before you reach fame, you must choose your side. And to reach your goal, all strategies are allowed: Alliances, betrayals, … everything is possible in
Timed game is over. 10 seconds left before the beginning of a new game!
##GAGNANT## wins the game and earn ##XP## experience points!10 seconds left before the beginning of a new game!
Server has been shut down... all players have been disconnected
Connection to server has been lost!
Disconnected from the server : the server has been shut down or you disconected yourself.
You have to wait for all the players of a team to die before respawning!
Press ##TOUCHEAVANCER## to move forward, ##TOUCHERECULER## to move backward, ##TOUCHEGAUCHE## to make a left step, ##TOUCHEDROITE## to make a right step, and the mouse to turn.
To selct a weapon or a jutsu, press the matching key... For example, to select shurikens, press ##TOUCHESHURIKEN##. Once the attack is selected, right click to use it.
Obviously, all keys can be set from the menu (##TOUCHEMENU##), in Options then Control. Do not hesitate to roam in the options, to modify mous sensibility, sounds, etc...

As you evolve in the game, you will level up. You will thus unlock new jutsus and earn jutsu and ability points. Now here's something to train yourself: a little ninja squad just for you, kill'em all!
This little tutorial is now over! For further informations about weapons, jutsus, game modes and Ninja Tooken in general, go straight to the Ninja's manual (website homepage)!
You cannot use this technique on this map !
Smoke bomb which doesn't deals damage.
Clous de ninja faisant des dégâts au sol.
If this option is checked, only games with friends are shown
Make a print screen and open it in a new window.
Screenshot save in the parameters of your account.
Error during the saving of your screenshot.
By changing the team, your current allies become your new enemies !
Allow you to activate/desactivate fire resistance.
Sends a shockwave with the sword.
Sends chakra in weapons and increase their damage (does not affect the Kusanagi).
Allows you to use chakra as an extension of life (the chakra does not regenerate).
##TOUCHE## : Sends a shockwave with the sword. (lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Sends chakra in weapons and increase their damage (does not affect the Kusanagi). (lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : Allows you to use chakra as an extension of life (the chakra does not regenerate). (lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
Up to an higher dan does not take away your experience points but you will restart the game at the first level.
A tropical coast bordering city by night
A castle in border of a waterfall
A castle in border of a river by day !
A castle in border of a river by night
Inside of a dojo, for duels or confrontation in small groups (max 4 players for a game recommended)
This ninja is giving you a harder fight than expected ? To defeat him you can try to avoid his attacks or you can attempt a closer move and kill him with your sword (##TOUCHEEPEE##).
A Shinto shrine in an enclosed valley by night.
Limit damages received by levels 60 or more until your level 46.
A camp hidden in an underground cavity.
A camp hidden in an underground cavity by night.
The parchment prevents the activation of this jutsu.
An arena in the courtyard of a castle.
The main chamber of a fortified town, with its castle.
Capture the flag by team: bring back 5 ennemy's flags/sashimonos to win.
Your team took ##NUM1## sashimono(s), and the opposing team ##NUM2## (##TOTAL## to capture)
A symmetrical map with two castles for playing "capture the sashimono"
The sashimono prevents the activation of this jutsu.
You captured the sashimono, bring it back to your base for scoring.
The sashimono of the ##TEAM## was taken back to the base.
The sashimono of the ##TEAM## has been captured.
Each player of the ##TEAM## receive ##XP## experience points.
It's no more possible to change.
The ##TEAM## has captured and bring back a sashimono and make one point.
Capture is impossible because there is nobody in the opposite team.
The number of capture to achieve to win the game.
When this option is enabled, you will login as an observer only (free camera).
The ##TEAM1## captured ##NUM1## sashimono(s), the ##TEAM2## ##NUM2## (##TOTAL## to capture)
Allows to drop the sashimono (flag) in a "capture the sashimono" game.
In this hostel, you definitely can't make an omelet without breaking some eggs.
You can now use ##JUTSUS##. Enabling from "My Ninja" (main menu).
This cemetery contains artifacts whose origin and source of power remain unknown.
On a given area and during several seconds, the Raiton's users and allies of the launcher, have their movement speed increased.
On a given area and during several seconds, the Doton's non-users and ennemies of the launcher, have their movement speed decreased.
On a given area and during several seconds, the Futon's non-users and ennemies of the launcher, have their sight obscured by a thick cloud of smoke.
On a given area and during several seconds, the Suiton's users and allies of the launcher, gain life.
On a given area and during several seconds, the Katon's users and allies of the launcher, have their weapons ignite.
##TOUCHE## : augmente la vitesse de déplacement du lanceur et des alliés (Raiton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : diminue la vitesse de déplacement des ennemis (Doton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : créé une zone embrumée pour se cacher, lanceur et alliés voient à travers (Futon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : se soigne ainsi que les alliés (Suiton, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).
##TOUCHE## : enflamme les armes du lanceur et des alliés (Katon, lvl. min.##LEVEL##).

accomplissements.ac: 3 ninjas killed with a single attack
2 ninjas killed with one explosive kunai
1 ninja killed while having less than 10 HP
Got yourself killed by an explosive barrel
1 ninja of each class killed without dying
More than 20 ninjas killed with the sword
1 ninja killed with the shadow shuriken
Solo map highest tower's top reached
More than 3 ninjas killed with one Explosion

courses.c: Wouhou, dozens of coins, and they're not in chocolate! Charge along, there's a huge pile of money to make here!
Apparently, Uncle Scrooge has been playing Tom Thumb with the Junior Woodchucks. He won't miss a few coins...
A burglary took place in the downtown Ninja Casino. The eleven burglars got away, but there's still a few extra coins for you to pick up!
Here we go again! Katashi, dead drunk, lost all his money. Hurry up and get it back to him.
The Groggy Ninja Bank got robbed again... Follow the thieves' tracks by gathering the GNB coins!

assassinat.a: ##NINJA##, a ninja believed to be Keyser Söze, has been spotted in the neighbourhood. Try to take him down!
A couple of ninjas had a pee on your carpet. That rug really tied the room together. Go get your revenge!
Remember on Valentine's Day? A ninja gave a bouquet of cherry tree flowers to [insert here the name of the girl/guy you're dating]: he's right there, show him/her who's the boss!
The ninjas who say Ni! sent you to find'em a schrubbery. Go back and tell'em it!
This town is too small for both of us. Meet me at noon for a duel... to death!!! Signed: ##NINJA##
